Reference

Datasets

Used in the examples.
..

.loadData()

Load a dataset

Interface

Graphical User Interface (shiny application)

RFATE_SHINY.run()

Shiny application to apply RFate functions

Build Plant Functional Groups (PFG)

Functions to select dominant species, compute functional distance between species and build clusters.
..

PRE_FATE.abundBraunBlanquet()

Transform Braun-Blanquet values into relative abundances

PRE_FATE.selectDominant()

Selection of dominant species from abundance releves

PRE_FATE.speciesDistance()

Computation of distances between species based on traits and niche overlap

PRE_FATE.speciesClustering_step1()

Create clusters based on dissimilarity matrix

PRE_FATE.speciesClustering_step2()

Choose clusters and select determinant species

PRE_FATE.speciesClustering_step3()

Calculate PFG traits values based on determinant species traits values

Create FATE-HD parameter files

Create user-friendly directory tree, parameter and simulation files for FATE-HD simulation.
..

PRE_FATE.skeletonDirectory()

Create the skeleton folder for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_PFGsuccession()

Create SUCCESSION parameter files for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_PFGlight()

Create LIGHT parameter files for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_PFGsoil()

Create SOIL parameter files for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_PFGdispersal()

Create DISPERSAL parameter files for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_PFGdisturbance()

Create DISTURBANCE parameter files for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_changingYears()

Create SCENARIO parameter files for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_saveYears()

Create SAVE parameter files for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_globalParameters()

Create Global_parameters parameter file for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_simulParameters()

Create Simul_parameters parameter file for a FATE-HD simulation

PRE_FATE.params_multipleSet()

Create multiple set(s) of parameter files for a FATE-HD simulation

.getParam()

Extract parameter value(s) from a parameter file

.setParam()

Replace parameter value(s) from a parameter file

.setPattern()

Replace a pattern with a new within all parameter files of a FATE-HD simulation folder

.upscaleMaps() .cropMaps()

Upscale / crop all raster maps of a FATE-HD simulation folder

Analyze FATE-HD outputs

Evalute predicted maps, produce summary and dynamic graphics.
..

POST_FATE.graphics()

Create all possible graphical representations for a FATE-HD simulation

POST_FATE.temporalEvolution()

Create tables of pixel temporal evolution of PFG abundances (and light and soil resources if activated) for a FATE-HD simulation

POST_FATE.graphic_evolutionCoverage()

Create a graphical representation of the evolution of PFG coverage and abundance through time for a FATE-HD simulation

POST_FATE.graphic_evolutionPixels()

Create a graphical representation of the evolution of PFG abundance through time for 5 (or more) pixels of a FATE-HD simulation

POST_FATE.relativeAbund()

Create relative abundance maps for each Plant Functional Group for one (or several) specific year of a FATE-HD simulation

POST_FATE.graphic_validationStatistics()

Create a graphical representation of several statistics for each PFG to asses the quality of the model
for one (or several) specific year of a FATE-HD simulation

POST_FATE.graphic_mapPFGvsHS()

Create maps of both Habitat suitability and simulated occurrences of each Plant Functional Group
for one (or several) specific year of a FATE-HD simulation

POST_FATE.graphic_mapPFGrichness()

Create a map of the Plant Functional Group richness
for one (or several) specific year of a FATE-HD simulation

POST_FATE.graphic_mapPFGcover()

Create a map of the Plant Functional Group cover
for one (or several) specific year of a FATE-HD simulation

POST_FATE.graphic_mapPFGlight()

Create a map of the community weighted mean (CWM) of light
for one (or several) specific year of a FATE-HD simulation

POST_FATE.graphic_mapPFGsoil()

Create a map of the community weighted mean (CWM) of soil
for one (or several) specific year of a FATE-HD simulation

.getCutoff()

Find cutoff to transform abundance values into binary values
